title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Skills: Task-Centered Education on Library Information Utilization in Science Fields

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can search for relevant materials in library online catalogs with 80% accuracy to conduct science research tasks.
Learners can compile reference lists on scientific topics (e.g., climate change) using academic databases and internet resources.
Learners can select scientific resources with 90% accuracy by applying criteria to evaluate the credibility of information sources.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
